thread.title: Great long weekend in Paris -
thread.title_full: Great long weekend in Paris - Review of Hotel Baltimore Paris Champs-Elysees, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: kevin h
title: Great long weekend in Paris -
text:
Stayed at the Baltimore to celebrate my wife's 70th birthday...found the staff excellent, my wife was suffering from a very bad knee(she had it replaced a week later) the staff always moved quickly to help her down the three steps leading from the lifts down to the reception area....and I must add it was all the staff not just one good individual.
Conciage was also very helpful with restraunt recommendations and getting taxis If we visit Paris again will certainly use this hotel.
The location is very good for most sites....
